title: Farrukh condemns Israeli army attack on Palestinians
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 11 (APP): Minister of State for Information and Broadcasting Farrukh Habib on Tuesday strongly condemned the shameful act of Israeli army on Palestinians while offering prayers at Al-Aqsa Mosque.
The minister, in a tweet, said : “Palestinians are brave people. However, the shameful act of Israeli Army to attack people while praying is highly condemnable.”
Palestinians are brave people.However, the shameful act of Israelis army to attack people while praying is highly condemnable. During this holy month, Keep those people in your prayers.
May Allah Protect The People Of Palestine #PrayForPalestine
— Farrukh Habib (@FarrukhHabibISF) May 11, 2021
He appealed to the masses that they should keep those people [Palestinians] in their prayers during the holy month of Ramazan.
